pageContext.claim: “So I said to the head, I called up, great dishwasher company from Ohio that we saved, by the way. I said, what's the problem with the dishwasher?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be talking about Michigan-based Whirlpool, which has a large manufacturing footprint in Ohio. Trump’s tariffs were initially a boon for the company, but the increasing costs to consumers and missed expectations led the company’s stock to drop 33 percent in 2018. The company’s stock has since recovered, but it has not reached pre-2018, pre-tariff levels. All of this to say, suggesting he “saved” Whirlpool is misleading at best.
